00025 /*
00026  * lustre/obdclass/local_storage.c
00027  *
00028  * Local storage for file/objects with fid generation. Works on top of OSD.
00029  *
00030  * Author: Mikhail Pershin <mike.pershin@intel.com>
00031  */
00032 #ifndef __LOCAL_STORAGE_H
00033 #define __LOCAL_STORAGE_H
00034 
00035 #include <dt_object.h>
00036 #include <obd.h>
00037 #include <lustre_fid.h>
00038 #include <lustre_disk.h>
00039 
00040 struct ls_device {
00041         struct dt_device         ls_top_dev;
00042         /* all initialized ls_devices on this node linked by this */
00043         struct list_head         ls_linkage;
00044         /* how many handle's reference this local storage */
00045         atomic_t                 ls_refcount;
00046         /* underlaying OSD device */
00047         struct dt_device        *ls_osd;
00048         /* list of all local OID storages */
00049         struct list_head         ls_los_list;
00050         struct mutex             ls_los_mutex;
00051 };
00052 
00053 static inline struct ls_device *dt2ls_dev(struct dt_device *d)
00054 {
00055         return container_of0(d, struct ls_device, ls_top_dev);
00056 }
00057 
00058 struct ls_object {
00059         struct lu_object_header  ls_header;
00060         struct dt_object         ls_obj;
00061 };
00062 
00063 static inline struct ls_object *lu2ls_obj(struct lu_object *o)
00064 {
00065         return container_of0(o, struct ls_object, ls_obj.do_lu);
00066 }
00067 
00068 static inline struct dt_object *ls_locate(const struct lu_env *env,
00069                                           struct ls_device *ls,
00070                                           const struct lu_fid *fid,
00071                                           const struct lu_object_conf *conf)
00072 {
00073         return dt_locate_at(env, ls->ls_osd, fid,
00074                             &ls->ls_top_dev.dd_lu_dev, conf);
00075 }
00076 
00077 struct ls_device *ls_device_get(struct dt_device *dev);
00078 void ls_device_put(const struct lu_env *env, struct ls_device *ls);
00079 struct local_oid_storage *dt_los_find(struct ls_device *ls, __u64 seq);
00080 void dt_los_put(struct local_oid_storage *los);
00081 
00082 /* Lustre 2.3 on-disk structure describing local object OIDs storage
00083  * the structure to be used with any sequence managed by
00084  * local object library.
00085  * Obsoleted since 2.4 but is kept for compatibility reasons,
00086  * see lastid_compat_check() in obdclass/local_storage.c */
00087 struct los_ondisk {
00088         __u32 lso_magic;
00089         __u32 lso_next_oid;
00090 };
00091 
00092 #define LOS_MAGIC       0xdecafbee
00093 
00097 enum los_object_role {
00098         LOS_PARENT,
00099         LOS_CHILD,
00100 };
00101 
00102 #endif
